title: What Will Happen When Cars Talk To Each Other? -- AFTER/DRIVE
description: With the U.S. government ready to make vehicle-to-vehicle (V2V) technology not only legal, but required, it's time we find out just what it means for drivers. Will privacy concerns overshadow safety and other benefits? With Andrew Del-Colle, Senior Editor of Popular Mechanics and J.F. Musial, Executive Producer of /DRIVE
